00029          static const std::string months[] = 
00030          {"Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec" };
00031          //number of days on each month
00032         static const int ndiem[] =   {0, 31, 28, 31, 30, 31, 30, 31, 31, 30, 31, 30, 31 };
00033         //total of days after each month
00034         static const int tdaem[] =  {0, 31, 59, 90, 120, 151, 181, 212, 243, 273, 304, 334, 365 };
00035         //total of days after each month in leap years
00036     static const int tdaemil[] = {0, 31, 60, 91, 121, 152, 182, 213, 244, 274, 305, 335, 366 };

00095         bool valid () const {
00096            bool yearOk = (year >= 1600);
00097              bool monthOk = (month>0 && month <= 12);
00098                     bool dayOk = false;
00099                     switch(mon){
00100                     case Feb :
00101                         if(leapYear())
00102                         dayOk = (day>0 && day<=29);
00103                         else dayOk  = (day>0 && day<=28);
00104                         break;
00105                     case Apr :
00106                     case Jun :
00107                     case Sep :
00108                     case Nov :
00109                         dayOk = (day>0 && day<=30);
00110                         break;
00111                     default:
00112                         dayOk = (day>0 && day<=31);
00113                     }
00114 
00115                     return (dayOk&&monthOk&&yearOk);}
00116                 // -----------
00117                 // leapyear
00118                 // -----------
00126                 bool leapYear() const{
00127                 assert(year>=1600);
00128                 bool leap = false;
00129                 if((year%4)==0){
00130                       leap = true;
00131                      if( ((year%100)==0) && !((year%400)==0))
00132                      leap = false;
00133                 }
00134                 return leap;
00135                 }

00149         Date (const T& days) {
00150             assert(days >= 0);
00151                  // 146 097 = num of days for every 400 yrs
00152 
00153             year = 1600;
00154             T tempDays = days;
00155             if(tempDays>=146097){
00156              year += 400 * (tempDays/146097);
00157               tempDays %= 146097;
00158               } 
00159                           
00160             if(tempDays>=36525){
00161             year += tempDays/36525 * 100; 
00162             tempDays %= 36525;
00163             }             
00164             if(tempDays>=1461){
00165             year +=  (std::min(24,(tempDays/1461))) * 4;
00166             tempDays %= 1461;
00167             }
00168             
00169              if(tempDays<=366) {}
00170             else{
00171                 tempDays -= 366; // reducing the leap year
00172                 year +=  (tempDays/365) + 1;  // adding the leap year + remaining years
00173                 }
00174             
00175              day = 1;
00176              month = -1; 
00177              if(leapYear()){
00178                  if(tempDays>365){
00179                          tempDays = 30;
00180                          month = 11;
00181                          --year;
00182                  }
00183                  else if(tempDays==365)
00184                  { 
00185                          tempDays = 30;
00186                          month = 11;
00187                  }
00188                  else{
00189                          for(int i = 0; i < 12; i++)
00190                          {
00191                                  if(tempDays >= (tdaemil[i]) && tempDays < (tdaemil[i+1]))
00192                                  {
00193                                          tempDays -= tdaemil[i];
00194                                          month = i;
00195                                  }
00196 
00197                          }
00198                  }
00199                  day = ++tempDays;
00200              }
00201              else
00202              {
00203                  if(tempDays==365)
00204                  { 
00205                          tempDays = 31;
00206                          month = 11;
00207                          --year;
00208                  }
00209                  else{
00210                          while(tempDays>365){
00211                                  tempDays-= 365; }
00212                          if(tempDays==365)
00213                          { 
00214                                  tempDays = 31;
00215                                  month = 11;
00216                                  --year;
00217                          }
00218                          else{
00219                                  for(int i = 0; i < 12; i++)
00220                                  {
00221                                          if(tempDays >= (tdaem[i]) && tempDays < (tdaem[i+1]))
00222                                          {
00223                                                  tempDays -= tdaem[i];
00224                                                  month = i;
00225                                          }
00226                                  }
00227                          }
00228                  }
00229                  day = tempDays;
00230              }
00231                 
00232             if (!valid())
00233                 throw std::invalid_argument("Date::Date()");}

00257         T to_days () const {
00258             T days = 0;
00259                 T tempDays=0;
00260          
00261              int years = year - 1600;
00262              bool leap = false;
00263              
00264              
00265              if(years>=400) //400 years
00266              {
00267                   tempDays += 146097 * (years/400);
00268                   years %= 400;
00269                 } 
00270                 if(years>=100) //100 years
00271                 {
00272                   tempDays += years/100 * 36524; 
00273                   years %= 100;
00274                 } 
00275                 if(years>=4) //4 years
00276                 {
00277                   tempDays +=  (std::min(24,(years/4))) * 1461;
00278                   years %= 4;
00279                 }
00280                 if(years == 0)
00281                   leap=true;
00282                 else if(years==1) 
00283                 { 
00284                         tempDays +=366;
00285                 
00286                 }
00287                 else{   //more than 1 year left                 
00288                         
00289                         tempDays +=366;
00290                         for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00291                         {
00292                                 if(years > 1)
00293                                 {
00294                                   --years;
00295                                    tempDays +=365; 
00296                                 }
00297                         }
00298               }
00299               
00300               
00301               if(leap)
00302               {
00303                 tempDays += tdaemil[month-1];
00304                 tempDays += day;
00305                 
00306               
00307               }
00308               else
00309               {
00310                         tempDays += tdaem[month-1];
00311                 tempDays += day;
00312               }
00313               --tempDays;
00314             
00315             
00316             
00317             assert(days >= 0);
00318             return tempDays;}

00357         Date& operator += (const T& days) {
00358            
00359            T theDays = to_days();
00360            
00361            const T total = theDays + day;
00362            
00363            if(total < 0)
00364            throw  std:: invalid_argument("Date+= would be before 1 jan 1600");
00365            
00366            
00367            try{
00368            *this = Date(total);
00369             return *this;
00370             }
00371             catch (std::invalid_argument& e){
00372              throw std::invalid_argument("Date+= would be before 1 jan 1600");
00373             }
00374             }

00388

00391            const T total = theDays - day;
00392            
00393            if(total < 0)
00394                 throw  std:: invalid_argument("Date+= would be before 1 jan 1600");
00395            
00396            try{
00397            *this = Date(total);
00398             return *this;
00399             }
00400             catch (std::invalid_argument& e){

00520 template <typename T>
00521 std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& lhs, const Date<T>& rhs) {
00522
